pages.text: $(li)Platypuses are small passive creatures mostly covered in brown fur, having gray on their bill and webbed feet.$(br)$(li)You don't want to attack them or you will be $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)Poisoned$(/l) for 5 seconds.$(br)$(li)Platypus can be bred with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/lobster_tail)Lobster Tails$(/l) or Cooked Lobster Tails.

$(li)You can attract Platypus with $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone)Redstone Dust$(/l).$(br)$(li)Give them $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone)Redstone Dust$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone_block)Redstone Blocks$(/l) to make them find something useful for you in near Clay blocks, like $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/maggot)Maggots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/clay_ball)Clay Balls$(/l), or even a $(l)Fedora$().
